title: WeibullR.shiny
text: Shiny web application life data analysis depends WeibullR, R package Weibull analysis.

title: WeibullR.shiny
text: install WeibullR.shiny R: install development version: launch app: access app browser, visit paulgovan.shinyapps.io/WeibullRshiny.

title: WeibullR.shiny
text: Launching app brings Landing tab. can access ReadMe, download example dataset, navigate Data tab.

title: WeibullR.shiny
text: example, use example ‘Time--Failure’ dataset. access, first download dataset locally Landing tab, use Data Input option Data tab upload dataset app. point, app look like image . additional options arranging data analysis, use default option.

title: WeibullR.shiny
text: Now click Modeling tab build model. app use default options build Probability Plot. Feel free try different options configure model. plot additional plot options configure plot.  Finally, click Contour Plot tab build contour plot. , plot options configuring contour plot.

title: WeibullR.shiny
text: info WeibullR.plotly, visit WeibullR.plotly interactive introduction Life Data Analysis, check WeibullR.learnr

title: Authors and Citation
text: Paul Govan. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.
